channel.title: How i make myself owner? -.-
channel.description:
can someone help me please? the source and client is this http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,540876.0.html
(639) and no i dont got "character"

item.title: How i make myself owner? -.-
item.dc:creator: @Redemtion Redemtion
item.description:
@Redemtion wrote:

[quote=“arham 4, post:3, topic:455834”][quote author=V 1 N C H link=topic=558752.msg4085988#msg4085988 date=1345854119]
Search for your player name. Open the file (If it’s .dat open with notepad, It will look weird) Search “Rights” Change the number that looks like it goes with that to 3 (May be 2, I haven’t looked at that kind of source in awhile) save it, And log back in.
[/quote]
No, in ActionSender.java look for

		if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("wildking72"))//STAFF
			player.getDefinition().setRights(2);

Change wildking72 to your username name.[/quote]
Do the same thing in the commands.java or w/e to gain owner commands aswell.

Read full topic

item.title: How i make myself owner? -.-
item.dc:creator: @arham_4 arham 4
item.description:
@arham_4 wrote:

V 1 N C H:

Search for your player name. Open the file (If it’s .dat open with notepad, It will look weird) Search “Rights” Change the number that looks like it goes with that to 3 (May be 2, I haven’t looked at that kind of source in awhile) save it, And log back in.

No, in ActionSender.java look for

		if (player.getUsername().equalsIgnoreCase("wildking72"))//STAFF
			player.getDefinition().setRights(2);

Change wildking72 to your username name.

Read full topic
